title: Sweet Tooth, Good Dentist
overview: Sant, a university student who has an unwavering love for sweets experiences the heartbreak of his life when he discovers he has a cavity! This forces him to seek treatment from Jay, a handsome dentist, who likes to act cool with a quirky personality. Starting as a tense, oil-and-water relationship, as Sant continues treatment, he begins to wonder whether Jay's caring nature is just part of the job or if there's something more beneath the surface.
